scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:nuxt: concurrently "npm start" "cd nuxt-app && npm run dev"
scripts.stop: powershell -Command "$p = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -EA SilentlyContinue | Select -Expand OwningProcess -Unique; if($p){Stop-Process -Id $p -Force; Write-Host 'Stopped port 3000'}else{Write-Host 'Port 3000 not in use'}"
